health+2.title: Heartbound Fortitude
health+2.description: Channel inner strength to permanently increase maximum health by 1 heart, allowing you to endure greater challenges.

health+4.title: Warrior's Resilience
health+4.description: Harness battle-hardened vitality to increase maximum health by 2 hearts, significantly improving your survival in dangerous encounters.

armor+1.title: Iron Guardian's Protection
armor+1.description: Enhance your natural defenses, gaining +1 armor point regardless of equipment worn. Your skin toughens against physical harm.

armor+2.title: Diamond Sentinel's Bulwark
armor+2.description: Master defensive techniques that grant +2 armor points, significantly reducing incoming damage even from powerful foes.

armor_toughness+1.title: Netherite Endurance
armor_toughness+1.description: Develop supernatural fortitude granting +1 armor toughness, making your defenses more effective against powerful attacks.

knockback_resistance+10%.title: Immovable Mountain Stance
knockback_resistance+10%.description: Root yourself like a mountain, gaining 10% resistance to being knocked back by enemy attacks and explosions.

attack_damage+5%.title: Iron Striker's Might
attack_damage+5%.description: Channel combat training to increase all attack damage by 5%, finding weak points in your enemies' defenses.

attack_damage+10%.title: Diamond Slayer's Fury
attack_damage+10%.description: Master devastating combat techniques that increase all attack damage by 10%, making each strike significantly more lethal.

attack_speed+5%.title: Golden Duelist's Swiftness
attack_speed+5%.description: Adopt agile fighting techniques that increase attack speed by 5%, allowing you to strike enemies more frequently.

attack_speed+10%.title: Netherite Blade Dancer
attack_speed+10%.description: Move with supernatural dexterity, increasing attack speed by 10% to unleash a flurry of deadly blows against your enemies.

crit_chance+5%.title: Precise Weak Point Hunter
crit_chance+5%.description: Develop a keen eye for vulnerabilities, increasing your critical hit chance by 5% to strike where it hurts most.

crit_damage+10%.title: Emerald Executioner's Edge
crit_damage+10%.description: Master lethal striking techniques, increasing critical hit damage by 10% to deliver devastating finishing blows.

life_steal+2%.title: Crimson Life Drinker
life_steal+2%.description: Infuse your strikes with vampiric energy, stealing 2% of damage dealt as health to sustain yourself in prolonged battles.

movement_speed+5%.title: Wind Walker's Grace
movement_speed+5%.description: Harness the wind's essence to move 5% faster, improving battlefield mobility and exploration speed.

arrow_damage+10%.title: Piercing Ballistic Mastery
arrow_damage+10%.description: Enhance your arrows with deadly precision, increasing arrow damage by 10% to strike true against distant foes.

arrow_velocity+5%.title: Skyward Arbalester
arrow_velocity+5%.description: Master techniques to launch arrows 5% faster, allowing them to hit targets more quickly and from greater distances.

draw_speed+10%.title: Swift Bowstring Technician
draw_speed+10%.description: Improve your bow handling techniques to draw 10% faster, allowing more rapid fire in the heat of battle.

max_mana+50.title: Azure Wellspring Expansion
max_mana+50.description: Widen your arcane channels to increase maximum mana by 50 points, supporting more powerful and frequent spell casting.

mana_regen+10.title: Mystic Aether Flow
mana_regen+10.description: Tune your body to the magical currents of the world, increasing mana regeneration by 10 points to recover faster between spellcasting.

cooldown_reduction+5%.title: Chronomancer's Acceleration
cooldown_reduction+5%.description: Bend time to your will, reducing spell cooldowns by 5% to cast powerful spells more frequently.

spell_power+5%.title: Arcane Amplification
spell_power+5%.description: Focus magical energies more effectively, increasing spell power by 5% to enhance all magical effects and damage.

dodge_chance+3%.title: Phantom Sidestep
dodge_chance+3%.description: Move with supernatural reflexes, gaining a 3% chance to completely avoid incoming attacks through quick maneuvering.

tank_specialization.title: Bulwark of the Immortal Fortress
tank_specialization.description: Become a living fortress with +2 armor and +4 hearts, allowing you to endure tremendous punishment and protect your allies.

melee_specialization.title: Blade Sovereign's Wrath
melee_specialization.description: Master the art of close combat, gaining 10% attack damage and 5% attack speed to become a fearsome frontline warrior.

ranged_specialization.title: Deadeye Sniper's Precision
ranged_specialization.description: Perfect the art of ranged combat, increasing arrow damage by 15% and arrow velocity by 10% to devastate enemies from a distance.

magic_specialization.title: Archmage's Forbidden Knowledge
magic_specialization.description: Unlock the deepest arcane secrets, gaining 100 max mana and 10% spell power to unleash magical devastation upon your enemies.

minor_health.title: Vitality Spark
minor_health.description: Awaken innate life energy, adding half a heart to your maximum health to better withstand injuries.

medium_health.title: Heart of Endurance
medium_health.description: Strengthen your life force, adding one full heart to your maximum health for improved survival.

major_health.title: Soul of the Immortal
major_health.description: Greatly expand your life essence, adding two full hearts to significantly improve your chance of survival.

minor_armor.title: Hardened Skin
minor_armor.description: Toughen your skin to gain +0.5 armor points, providing a small but helpful defense against physical attacks.

medium_armor.title: Iron Flesh Barrier
medium_armor.description: Develop resilient flesh that grants +1 armor point, noticeably reducing damage from enemy attacks.

major_armor.title: Diamond Hide Defender
major_armor.description: Transform your body to gain +2 armor points, significantly reducing incoming damage from all sources.

minor_toughness.title: Resolute Defense
minor_toughness.description: Develop resilience against powerful attacks, gaining +0.5 armor toughness to better withstand heavy blows.

medium_toughness.title: Unyielding Bastion
medium_toughness.description: Master defensive techniques that grant +1 armor toughness, making your armor significantly more effective.

minor_knockback_res.title: Steadfast Footing
minor_knockback_res.description: Plant your feet firmly to gain 3% knockback resistance, making you harder to displace in combat.

medium_knockback_res.title: Mountain's Stance
medium_knockback_res.description: Become as immovable as a mountain with 5% knockback resistance, better withstanding powerful attacks.

minor_dodge.title: Swift Evasion
minor_dodge.description: Develop basic evasive maneuvers, gaining a 1% chance to completely avoid incoming attacks.

medium_dodge.title: Shadow Dancer
medium_dodge.description: Move with increased agility to gain a 2% chance of dodging attacks entirely through quick reflexes.

major_dodge.title: Phantom's Mirage
major_dodge.description: Move like a phantom to gain a 3% chance to completely evade incoming attacks through supernatural reflexes.

minor_attack_damage.title: Warrior's Edge
minor_attack_damage.description: Sharpen your combat techniques to increase attack damage by 2%, making each strike more effective.

medium_attack_damage.title: Soldier's Strength
medium_attack_damage.description: Enhance your striking power to increase attack damage by 3%, delivering more decisive blows.

major_attack_damage.title: Champion's Might
major_attack_damage.description: Master combat techniques that increase attack damage by 5%, making you significantly more deadly in combat.

minor_attack_speed.title: Swift Strikes
minor_attack_speed.description: Develop faster combat techniques to increase attack speed by 2%, allowing for quicker strikes.

medium_attack_speed.title: Rapid Combatant
medium_attack_speed.description: Refine your attack rhythms to increase attack speed by 3%, delivering more strikes in less time.

minor_crit_chance.title: Keen Eye
minor_crit_chance.description: Train to spot weaknesses in enemy defenses, gaining a 2% increased chance to land critical hits.

medium_crit_chance.title: Vulnerability Hunter
medium_crit_chance.description: Master the art of finding weak points, gaining a 3% increased chance to deal critical damage.

minor_crit_damage.title: Precise Striker
minor_crit_damage.description: Learn to make your critical hits 5% more devastating by striking with greater precision.

medium_crit_damage.title: Devastating Precision
medium_crit_damage.description: Master the art of targeting vital areas, making your critical hits 10% more powerful.

minor_life_steal.title: Blood Siphon
minor_life_steal.description: Infuse your attacks with vampiric energy, stealing 1% of damage dealt as health to sustain yourself.

medium_life_steal.title: Essence Drain
medium_life_steal.description: Enhance your vampiric abilities to steal 2% of damage dealt as health, significantly improving combat sustainability.

minor_movement_speed.title: Swift Steps
minor_movement_speed.description: Develop lighter steps to move 2% faster, enhancing your overall mobility.

medium_movement_speed.title: Fleet-Footed
medium_movement_speed.description: Master movement techniques to increase your speed by 3%, allowing for faster travel and combat positioning.

minor_step_height.title: Nimble Climber
minor_step_height.description: Develop agile movements to step 0.1 blocks higher without jumping, improving mobility across uneven terrain.

minor_arrow_damage.title: Sharpshooter
minor_arrow_damage.description: Refine your archery techniques to increase arrow damage by 3%, making each shot more lethal.

medium_arrow_damage.title: Deadly Archer
medium_arrow_damage.description: Master archery to increase arrow damage by 5%, significantly enhancing your ranged combat effectiveness.

minor_arrow_velocity.title: Power Shot
minor_arrow_velocity.description: Learn to draw your bow with more force, increasing arrow velocity by 2% for faster projectiles.

medium_arrow_velocity.title: Piercing Flight
medium_arrow_velocity.description: Master bow techniques to increase arrow velocity by 4%, making your shots harder to dodge.

minor_draw_speed.title: Quick Draw
minor_draw_speed.description: Improve your bow handling to draw 5% faster, allowing more rapid fire in combat.

medium_draw_speed.title: Lightning Draw
medium_draw_speed.description: Master rapid drawing techniques to ready your bow 8% faster, substantially improving your rate of fire.

minor_max_mana.title: Arcane Reservoir
minor_max_mana.description: Expand your inner magical reserves to gain 20 additional maximum mana, allowing for more spell casting.

medium_max_mana.title: Mystic Wellspring
medium_max_mana.description: Significantly expand your magical capacity to gain 35 additional maximum mana for extended spellcasting.

major_max_mana.title: Archmage's Reservoir
major_max_mana.description: Master the art of mana storage to gain 50 additional maximum mana, enabling the casting of powerful spell combinations.

minor_mana_regen.title: Mana Flow
minor_mana_regen.description: Attune yourself to magical energies, increasing mana regeneration by 5 to recover faster after spellcasting.

medium_mana_regen.title: Arcane Current
medium_mana_regen.description: Channel magical energies more efficiently to increase mana regeneration by 8, greatly reducing recovery time between spells.

minor_cooldown_reduction.title: Spell Efficiency
minor_cooldown_reduction.description: Learn to weave spells more efficiently, reducing cooldowns by 2% to cast more frequently.

medium_cooldown_reduction.title: Arcane Acceleration
medium_cooldown_reduction.description: Master spell recovery techniques to reduce cooldowns by 4%, allowing significantly faster reuse of powerful spells.

minor_spell_power.title: Arcane Focus
minor_spell_power.description: Learn to focus magical energies more effectively, increasing spell power by 2% for greater magical impact.

medium_spell_power.title: Potent Casting
medium_spell_power.description: Master magical channeling to increase spell power by 4%, significantly enhancing all spell effects.

minor_cast_time_reduction.title: Swift Incantation
minor_cast_time_reduction.description: Perfect your spellcasting technique to reduce casting time by 3%, allowing faster spell execution.

fire_spell_power.title: Pyromancer's Flame
fire_spell_power.description: Attune yourself to fire magic, increasing fire spell power by 5% for more devastating flame-based attacks.

ice_spell_power.title: Cryomancer's Frost
ice_spell_power.description: Harness the power of cold to increase ice spell power by 5%, enhancing all frost-based magic.

lightning_spell_power.title: Stormcaller's Surge
lightning_spell_power.description: Channel the power of storms to increase lightning spell power by 5%, electrifying your magical arsenal.

holy_spell_power.title: Divine Channeler
holy_spell_power.description: Connect with divine energies to increase holy spell power by 5%, strengthening healing and sacred magics.

ender_spell_power.title: Void Walker
ender_spell_power.description: Attune yourself to the End's energies to increase ender spell power by 5%, enhancing teleportation and void magic.

blood_spell_power.title: Crimson Ritualist
blood_spell_power.description: Master the forbidden art of blood magic to increase blood spell power by 5%, enhancing life-force manipulation.

evocation_spell_power.title: Summoner's Will
evocation_spell_power.description: Strengthen your command over summoned entities, increasing evocation spell power by 5%.

nature_spell_power.title: Druidic Connection
nature_spell_power.description: Attune yourself to natural energies to increase nature spell power by 5%, enhancing plant and earth magic.

ars_mana_discount.title: Efficient Spellcraft
ars_mana_discount.description: Master magical efficiency to reduce Ars Nouveau spell mana cost by 2%, allowing more spells with the same mana.

luck_boost.title: Blessing of Lady Fortune
luck_boost.description: The fickle goddess of fortune smiles upon you, granting +2 Luck. Your hands seem to find valuable treasures more often, chests yield better loot, and chance-based events mysteriously shift in your favor.

mining_speed_boost.title: Dwarven Excavation Technique
mining_speed_boost.description: Channel the ancient mining wisdom of the mountain dwarves, increasing mining speed by 10%. Your strikes become more precise, allowing you to tear through stone and ore with supernatural efficiency.

experience_boost.title: Scholar's Enlightenment
experience_boost.description: Your mind becomes a perfect vessel for knowledge, gaining 5% more experience from all sources. Every lesson learned, enemy defeated, and ore mined yields greater wisdom than before.

absorption_boost.title: Golden Heart Enchantment
absorption_boost.description: Ancient protective magics flow through your veins, increasing maximum absorption by 2 hearts. Your body can now maintain more powerful magical shields, creating golden hearts that absorb damage before your life force.

block_break_speed.title: Mountain Splitter's Fury
block_break_speed.description: Your strikes resonate with earth-shattering force, granting 5% faster block breaking with all tools. Stone crumbles before your might, and even the hardest materials yield more quickly to your determined efforts.

projectile_damage.title: Ballistic Perfection
projectile_damage.description: Master the art of projectile warfare, increasing all projectile damage by 5%. Your arrows, tridents, and thrown weapons cut through the air with deadly precision, striking with enhanced force.

collection_range.title: Gravitational Attraction Aura
collection_range.description: Items seem mysteriously drawn to you, extending your pickup range by 1 block. This magnetic aura pulls dropped resources into your possession from greater distances, making collection effortless.

swim_speed.title: Triton's Aquatic Mastery
swim_speed.description: The blessing of the sea gods flows through you, increasing swimming speed by 15%. Water parts willingly before your graceful movements, allowing you to glide through oceans and rivers with supernatural ease.

drinking_speed.title: Alchemical Gulping Mastery
drinking_speed.description: Your throat muscles have adapted to magical elixirs, increasing drinking speed by 20%. Consume potions in the blink of an eye, allowing for tactical use of brews even in the heat of battle.

eating_speed.title: Ravenous Consumption
eating_speed.description: Your digestive prowess becomes legendary, increasing eating speed by 20%. Devour meals in seconds rather than moments, allowing you to restore hunger even during brief respites in combat.

critical_bonus_damage.title: Assassin's Fatal Strike
critical_bonus_damage.description: Master the art of exploiting weaknesses, increasing critical hit bonus damage by 5%. When your strikes find vital points, they deal devastating additional damage, often ending fights in a single, perfect blow.

fall_damage_reduction.title: Cloudwalker's Descent
fall_damage_reduction.description: The winds seem to catch your fall, reducing falling damage by 20%. Your body has learned to roll with impact and distribute force, allowing you to survive drops that would cripple others.

safe_fall_distance.title: Feline Graceful Landing
safe_fall_distance.description: Like a cat, you've mastered the art of falling safely, increasing your safe fall distance by 1 block. Your legs instinctively absorb shock, allowing you to drop from greater heights without injury.

jump_strength.title: Grasshopper's Mighty Leap
jump_strength.description: Your legs surge with incredible power, increasing jump height by 10%. Leap higher obstacles, reach greater heights, and traverse terrain with unprecedented mobility and grace.

attack_burning_damage.title: Emberblade Infusion
attack_burning_damage.description: Your weapons flicker with arcane flames, adding 5 burning damage to melee attacks. Each strike ignites enemies with magical fire that continues to burn long after the blade is withdrawn.

healing_received.title: Vitality Amplification
healing_received.description: Your body resonates with life-giving energies, increasing healing received by 10%. Potions, regeneration effects, and other healing sources restore significantly more health, making recovery far more efficient.

oxygen_bonus.title: Abyssal Lung Capacity
oxygen_bonus.description: Your lungs expand to miraculous capacity, granting 30 extra oxygen points. Remain underwater for dramatically longer periods, exploring ocean depths and undertaking aquatic endeavors that would leave others gasping.

water_speed.title: Merfolk Swimming Technique
water_speed.description: Your movements in water become fluid and powerful, increasing water speed by 15%. Slice through currents with the grace of a born swimmer, outpacing aquatic creatures in their own domain.

water_visibility.title: Kraken's Crystal Vision
water_visibility.description: Your eyes adapt perfectly to aquatic environments, improving underwater visibility by 50%. Peer through murky depths with supernatural clarity, spotting treasures, threats, and secrets hidden from normal sight.

armor_pierce.title: Phantom Strike Technique
armor_pierce.description: Master the secret arts of bypassing defenses, ignoring 5% of your target's armor. Your attacks find the joints and weaknesses in any protection, striking as if facing a less armored foe.

armor_shred.title: Ruinous Armor Degradation
armor_shred.description: Your strikes weaken the very structure of armor, temporarily reducing target's protection by 3%. Each hit degrades their defenses, making subsequent attacks increasingly deadly as the battle continues.

cold_damage.title: Winterfrost Weapon Enchantment
cold_damage.description: Your weapons crystallize with biting frost, adding 5% cold damage to attacks. Strikes chill enemies to the bone, numbing their limbs and slowing their movements while inflicting additional suffering.

fire_damage.title: Infernal Flame Attunement
fire_damage.description: Nether energies infuse your attacks, adding 5% fire damage to each strike. Your blows ignite with hellish flames, burning enemies from within and continuing to harm them after contact.

current_hp_damage.title: Reaper's Proportional Strike
current_hp_damage.description: Your attacks become more devastating the healthier your enemy is, dealing additional damage equal to 2% of your target's current health. Like a true executioner, you excel at beginning the slaughter of even the mightiest foes.

attack_knockback.title: Titan's Forceful Impact
attack_knockback.description: Your strikes carry tremendous force, increasing knockback by 0.5. Enemies are sent flying farther when struck, creating tactical distance and preventing them from retaliating immediately.

entity_interaction_range.title: Extended Reach Mastery
entity_interaction_range.description: Your influence extends beyond normal boundaries, increasing interaction range with entities by 1 block. Trade with villagers, interact with animals, and manage creatures from a greater distance.

block_interaction_range.title: Master Builder's Reach
block_interaction_range.description: Your control over the physical world extends further, increasing block interaction range by 1 block. Place and break blocks from greater distances, making building and mining more convenient and safe.

nametag_distance.title: Eagle-Eyed Recognition
nametag_distance.description: Your vision sharpens to supernatural clarity, increasing nametag visibility distance by 10 blocks. Identify friends and foes from remarkable distances, gaining critical tactical information before engagement.

mob_detection_range.title: Shadow Walker's Stealth
mob_detection_range.description: You become a ghost in the shadows, reducing hostile mob detection range by 20%. Creatures sense your presence only when you draw much closer, allowing for stealthy approaches and safer exploration.

lava_visibility.title: Infernal Clarity Sight
lava_visibility.description: Your eyes have adapted to the blinding heat of molten rock, improving lava visibility by 50%. Navigate fiery depths with confidence, seeing obstacles and treasures that others would miss in the blazing glow.

lava_speed.title: Magma Swimmer's Grace
lava_speed.description: Your body slips through molten rock with unnatural ease, increasing lava movement speed by 10%. The scorching liquid parts willingly for your passage, allowing you to navigate the fiery depths with greater agility.

dropped_experience.title: Soul Harvester's Gift
dropped_experience.description: You've mastered the art of extracting wisdom from fallen foes, increasing experience dropped by monsters by 10%. Your keen understanding of life essence allows you to glean greater knowledge from each victory.

bonus_rare_loot_rolls.title: Fortune Seeker's Blessing
bonus_rare_loot_rolls.description: The gods of fortune smile upon you, granting 1 additional roll for rare loot from defeated enemies. Your keen eye for valuable treasures helps you discover exceptional items that others would miss.

bonus_loot_count_rolls.title: Treasure Hunter's Bounty
bonus_loot_count_rolls.description: You've developed a knack for thoroughly searching fallen foes, gaining 1 additional roll for extra loot items. Your meticulous attention to detail often reveals hidden treasures that would otherwise be overlooked.

magic_protection.title: Arcane Ward Enchantment
magic_protection.description: Protective sigils manifest across your skin, granting 5 points of magic protection. Hostile spells and magical damage are partially absorbed by these mystical wards, leaving you less vulnerable to arcane attacks.

spectral_sight.title: Veil Walker's Vision
spectral_sight.description: Your eyes pierce the barrier between dimensions, gaining spectral sight with 5 points of aura detection. Glimpse the outlines of entities through solid matter, seeing what lies hidden from mortal eyes.

elytra_flight.title: Windmaster's Aerial Mastery
elytra_flight.description: Your understanding of aerodynamics and wind currents improves, increasing elytra flight efficiency by 10%. Glide farther, maintain altitude better, and navigate with greater precision while soaring through the skies.

ghost_health.title: Spectral Barrier Matrix
ghost_health.description: Ethereal energies surround your form, creating 5 points of ghost health that absorb damage. This phantom shield intercepts incoming blows, dissipating after protecting you from harm.

overheal.title: Life Essence Overflow
overheal.description: Your body can temporarily sustain more life energy than normal, allowing healing to exceed your maximum health by 5%. This excess vitality gradually fades over time but provides crucial protection in dangerous situations.

prot_pierce.title: Enchantment Nullifier
prot_pierce.description: You've studied the arcane weaknesses of magical protection, allowing your attacks to bypass 2 points of enchantment protection. Your weapon strikes slice through magical barriers as if they were mere illusions.

prot_shred.title: Warding Dissolution
prot_shred.description: Your attacks erode magical defenses, temporarily reducing enchantment protection by 3%. Each strike weakens the arcane shields surrounding your enemy, rendering them increasingly vulnerable to subsequent blows.

summon_power.title: Master Conjurer's Authority
summon_power.description: Your connection to the summoning planes strengthens, granting your conjured entities 5% more power. Creatures you bring forth manifest with greater strength, resilience, and capability in service to your will.

ars_saturation.title: Arcane Nourishment
ars_saturation.description: The magical energies flowing through you now sustain your physical form, providing 5 points of magical saturation. Casting spells occasionally fills your hunger bar, converting raw arcane power into bodily nourishment.

ars_feather.title: Zephyr's Divine Grace
ars_feather.description: While channeling arcane energies, air itself cushions your falls. When actively casting spells, you descend as gently as a feather, never taking damage from even the highest drops as magic buoys your descent.

invincibility_ticks.title: Temporal Displacement Shield
invincibility_ticks.description: After taking damage, you briefly phase partially out of normal time, extending your invulnerability period by 5 ticks. This temporal displacement provides crucial moments to recover and reposition during intense combat.

mount_speed.title: Beast Master's Command
mount_speed.description: Your exceptional connection with animals allows you to coax 10% greater speed from any mount. Horses, striders, and other beasts respond to your guidance with supernatural enthusiasm and energy.

movement_speed_on_snow.title: Frostwalker's Stride
movement_speed_on_snow.description: You've mastered the art of traversing frozen landscapes, gaining 15% increased movement speed on snow. While others flounder in drifts, you glide across the surface with the confident grace of a winter wolf.

slip_resistance.title: Steadfast Footing
slip_resistance.description: Your exceptional balance and coordinated movements grant 25% resistance to slippery surfaces. Ice and honey blocks provide more traction beneath your feet, allowing precise control where others slide helplessly.

sprinting_speed.title: Wind Runner's Velocity
sprinting_speed.description: You've perfected the art of the sprint, moving 10% faster when running. Your strides lengthen and your feet barely touch the ground as you dash across the landscape with supernatural speed and grace.

sprinting_step_height.title: Obstacle Runner's Leap
sprinting_step_height.description: While sprinting, your momentum carries you effortlessly over small obstacles, increasing step height by 0.5 blocks. Hurdle low barriers without breaking stride, maintaining your velocity across uneven terrain.

entity_experience.title: Monster Hunter's Insight
entity_experience.description: Your methodical study of monster anatomy yields greater knowledge from each kill, increasing experience from hostile entities by 10%. Each victory provides deeper insights into the nature of your foes.

villager_reputation.title: Diplomatic Renown
villager_reputation.description: Your exceptional reputation precedes you, granting +5 standing with village communities. Villagers recognize your honorable deeds and trustworthy nature, offering better trades and greater hospitality.

fall_flying.title: Skyborn Mastery
fall_flying.description: Your instinctive understanding of aerodynamics improves elytra control by 15%. Navigate with greater precision, perform tighter turns, and maintain stable flight even in turbulent conditions.

ether_resistance.title: Planar Barrier
ether_resistance.description: Your body develops a mystical resistance to interdimensional forces, gaining 10% ether resistance. Void energies and planar distortions have less effect on you, reducing damage from these otherworldly sources.

throw_potion_distance.title: Alchemical Hurler
throw_potion_distance.description: Your throwing arm becomes legendary, increasing potion throw distance by 1 block. Launch alchemical concoctions with greater range, hitting distant targets before they can approach.

blood_magic_resist.title: Vitae Warding
blood_magic_resist.description: Your life essence resists external manipulation, gaining 5% resistance to blood magic. Crimson spells struggle to affect your well-protected vital force, significantly reducing their harmful effects.

eldritch_magic_resist.title: Mind's Bulwark
eldritch_magic_resist.description: Your sanity is fortified against cosmic horrors, granting 5% resistance to eldritch magic. Otherworldly spells struggle to penetrate the mental barriers you've constructed through exposure to the unknowable.

eldritch_spell_power.title: Forbidden Knowledge Wielder
eldritch_spell_power.description: Your mind has glimpsed beyond the veil of reality, increasing eldritch spell power by 5%. Channel cosmic forces with greater potency as your understanding of impossible geometries grows deeper.

ender_magic_resist.title: Teleportation Anchor
ender_magic_resist.description: Your physical form resists spatial manipulation, granting 5% resistance to ender magic. Your position in reality becomes more fixed, making you less vulnerable to teleportation effects and void energies.

fire_magic_resist.title: Flame-Touched Soul
fire_magic_resist.description: Your essence gains properties of the infernal planes, providing 5% resistance to fire magic. Magical flames diminish as they approach your naturally heat-resistant form.

ice_magic_resist.title: Frostborn Resilience
ice_magic_resist.description: Your inner fire cannot be extinguished by winter's grasp, providing 5% resistance to ice magic. Freezing spells struggle to slow your movements or chill your core as your body maintains its vital heat.

lightning_magic_resist.title: Stormchild's Immunity
lightning_magic_resist.description: Electrical energies flow harmlessly through your adapted nervous system, granting 5% resistance to lightning magic. Your body has learned to channel and disperse magical electricity rather than succumbing to its shocking power.

evocation_magic_resist.title: Binding Disruptor
evocation_magic_resist.description: Your aura naturally disrupts conjuration energies, providing 5% resistance to evocation magic. Summoned creatures find it harder to maintain their form in your presence, and binding spells slip away like water.

holy_magic_resist.title: Divine Judgment Evasion
holy_magic_resist.description: Your spirit exists in a moral gray area that confounds divine energies, granting 5% resistance to holy magic. Sacred light struggles to judge what it cannot clearly perceive, reducing its impact on your complex soul.

nature_magic_resist.title: Wild Harmony
nature_magic_resist.description: Your spiritual connection with the natural world provides 5% resistance to nature magic. Primal forces recognize you as part of their domain rather than an intruder to be expelled or consumed.

spell_resist.title: Arcane Diffusion Field
spell_resist.description: A subtle field of anti-magic surrounds you, providing 5% resistance to all spells. Magical energies dissipate slightly as they approach, weakening their effects regardless of school or source.

summon_damage.title: Conjurer's Empowerment
summon_damage.description: The creatures you conjure manifest with greater ferocity, dealing 5% more damage. Your summoned allies strike with supernatural precision and power, tearing through enemies with enhanced fury.

phase.title: Ethereal Existence
phase.description: Your physical form occasionally slips between dimensions, gaining 20% phasing ability. Parts of your body can momentarily exist slightly out of phase with normal reality, allowing limited movement through solid objects.

mc_mob_damage.title: Colony Defender's Wrath
mc_mob_damage.description: Your righteous fury against those who threaten settlements manifests as 10% increased damage against colony raiders. Strike with enhanced power when defending your community from barbaric invaders.

explosion_knockback_resistance.title: Blast Anchoring
explosion_knockback_resistance.description: Your stance widens instinctively when explosions occur, granting 10% resistance to explosion knockback. While others are sent flying, you maintain your footing against devastating blasts.

flying_speed.title: Empyrean Velocity
flying_speed.description: The air itself seems eager to carry you aloft, increasing flying speed by 10%. Move through the skies with greater velocity when using creative flight abilities.

follow_range.title: Loyal Companion's Bond
follow_range.description: Your connection with tamed creatures transcends normal limitations, extending follow range by 5 blocks. Pets and companions will stay by your side over greater distances, maintaining their loyal vigil even when you roam far.

gravity.title: Featherweight Essence
gravity.description: Your body becomes strangely buoyant, reducing gravitational effects by 10%. Fall more slowly, jump slightly higher, and move with an uncanny lightness that defies the normal pull of the earth.

scale.title: Imposing Presence
scale.description: Your physical form expands slightly as power flows through you, increasing size by 5%. Tower over ordinary beings with your enhanced stature, inspiring awe or fear in those who behold your magnified presence.

mining_efficiency.title: Master Excavator
mining_efficiency.description: Your technique with mining tools approaches perfection, increasing efficiency by 5%. Each strike connects with precision, maximizing the effectiveness of your tools and minimizing wasted energy.

sneaking_speed.title: Shadow Dancer's Stealth
sneaking_speed.description: Your crouched movements become unnaturally swift, increasing sneaking speed by 15%. Move silently with the grace of a stalking panther, maintaining stealth without sacrificing mobility.

submerged_mining_speed.title: Abyssal Excavator
submerged_mining_speed.description: You've adapted mining techniques for underwater work, increasing submerged mining speed by 20%. While others struggle against aquatic resistance, your tools slice through water and stone with equal ease.

sweeping_damage_ratio.title: Blade Dancer's Whirlwind
sweeping_damage_ratio.description: Your sword techniques evolve into deadly arcs, increasing sweeping damage by 10%. Cut through multiple foes with devastating efficiency as your blade dances from one target to the next in elegant, deadly patterns.

creative_flight.title: Ascendant's Skyward Freedom
creative_flight.description: Your connection to the primal forces of air grows stronger, providing a 30% chance of temporary creative flight. Brief moments of untethered freedom allow you to soar through the skies without mechanical assistance.

hover_flight.title: Arcane Levitation Mastery
hover_flight.description: Gravity's hold on you weakens as you master arcane forces, granting a 30% chance of hover flight capability. Focus your will to temporarily suspend yourself in mid-air, defying the natural order with magical suspension.

stamina_boost.title: Runner's Endurance
stamina_boost.description: Through rigorous training, your body processes nutrients more efficiently, increasing your stamina by 0.5 points. Food and saturation last longer, allowing sustained activity without frequent breaks for meals.

fortune_finder.title: Prospector's Eye
fortune_finder.description: Develop an uncanny sense for valuable resources, gaining +1 Fortune when mining. Even without enchanted tools, you instinctively strike deposits at their richest points to yield additional materials.

arcane_power.title: Arcane Amplification
arcane_power.description: Channel magical energies with greater efficiency, increasing magic damage by 5%. Your spells and enchanted attacks strike with enhanced potency, making your arcane assaults more devastating.

striking_technique.title: Warrior's Precision
striking_technique.description: Perfect your martial techniques to increase melee damage by 5%. Each strike targets vulnerable points with expert precision, maximizing the impact of your close-quarters attacks.

marksman_training.title: Marksman's Focus
marksman_training.description: Refine your aim to increase ranged damage by 5%. Hours of practice allow you to consistently target vital areas, making your arrows and projectiles strike with enhanced force.

healing_potency.title: Restorative Mastery
healing_potency.description: Master the arts of restoration to increase all healing effects by 10%. Your body responds more efficiently to potions, food, and magical healing, recovering more health from all sources.

leap_enhancement.title: Enhanced Leap
leap_enhancement.description: Strengthen your leg muscles to jump 10% higher. Reach new heights and clear obstacles with greater ease as your powerful leaps carry you further than normal.

resilience_training.title: Physical Resilience
resilience_training.description: Toughen your body through rigorous training, reducing all incoming damage by 5%. Your hardened physique withstands impacts that would severely injure others.

arcane_warding.title: Arcane Warding
arcane_warding.description: Develop mystical defenses that reduce magic damage by 8%. Your body naturally disperses hostile magical energies, minimizing harm from spells and enchanted attacks.

combat_training.title: Combat Hardening
combat_training.description: Master defensive combat techniques to reduce melee damage taken by 2%. Your practiced movements deflect and absorb impacts, turning potentially lethal blows into glancing hits.

projectile_avoidance.title: Projectile Awareness
projectile_avoidance.description: Train your reflexes to subconsciously avoid projectiles, reducing ranged damage by 8%. Your body instinctively shifts to minimize exposure to incoming arrows and other missiles.

efficient_mining.title: Efficient Excavator
efficient_mining.description: Perfect your mining techniques to increase overall mining speed by 10%. Each swing becomes more productive as you instinctively target structural weaknesses in all materials.

pickaxe_mastery.title: Pickaxe Mastery
pickaxe_mastery.description: Specialize in pickaxe techniques, increasing mining speed with pickaxes by 12%. Your expert knowledge of stone and ore formations allows for more efficient extraction of hard materials.

axe_mastery.title: Axe Mastery
axe_mastery.description: Refine your woodcutting techniques, increasing axe mining speed by 12%. Your precise strokes target the natural grain of wood and other axe-appropriate materials for faster harvesting.

shovel_mastery.title: Shovel Mastery
shovel_mastery.description: Master the art of digging to increase shovel mining speed by 12%. Your efficient scooping techniques make short work of dirt, sand, gravel, and other loose materials.

swift_sprint.title: Swift Sprint
swift_sprint.description: Optimize your running form to increase sprinting speed by 8%. Your powerful strides and efficient movement allow you to cover ground more quickly when dashing.

impact_force.title: Impact Force
impact_force.description: Channel your strength into powerful blows, increasing knockback by 0.2. Your attacks send enemies flying further, creating tactical distance and disrupting enemy formations.

efficient_repair.title: Master Smith
efficient_repair.description: Your expertise in smithing reduces anvil repair costs by 15%. Efficiently restore worn tools and armor with minimal experience investment through your masterful repair techniques.

armor_penetration.title: Armor Penetration
armor_penetration.description: Learn to target weak points in armor, reducing enemy armor points by 2 when you attack. Your precision strikes find gaps in protective gear, bypassing a portion of their defensive value.

toughness_penetration.title: Structural Weakness Exploitation
toughness_penetration.description: Identify and exploit structural weaknesses in enemy armor, reducing armor toughness by 2 when you attack. Your blows target points where material strength is compromised, diminishing the armor's ability to absorb heavy impacts.

protective_negation.title: Enchantment Negation
protective_negation.description: Your attacks partially disrupt protective enchantments, reducing enemy protection enchantment effectiveness by 1 level. Your strikes temporarily interfere with magical defenses, making them less effective against your assaults.

resilience_disruption.title: Resilience Disruption
resilience_disruption.description: Your attacks temporarily weaken an enemy's physical resilience, reducing their resistance attribute by 5%. Strike at pressure points that momentarily disrupt their ability to withstand damage from all sources.

spell_disruption.title: Spell Disruption
spell_disruption.description: Your attacks momentarily disrupt magical defenses, reducing enemy magic resistance by 8%. Each strike creates arcane interference that weakens their protection against magical damage.

combat_vulnerability.title: Combat Vulnerability
combat_vulnerability.description: Target weak defensive stances, reducing enemy melee resistance by 8%. Your attacks force opponents into vulnerable positions, making them more susceptible to follow-up melee strikes.

exposure_tactics.title: Exposure Tactics
exposure_tactics.description: Force enemies into exposed positions, reducing their ranged resistance by 8%. Your tactical strikes compromise their ability to defend against incoming projectiles.

vitality_recovery.title: Enhanced Vitality
vitality_recovery.description: Your body's natural healing processes become more efficient, increasing natural health regeneration by 15%. Recover from injuries faster as your enhanced metabolism repairs damage at an accelerated rate.

shadow_movement.title: Shadow Movement
shadow_movement.description: Master the art of silent movement, decreasing enemy detection range by 15%. Move like a shadow through hostile territory as your stealthy approach makes you harder to detect.

vampiric_strikes.title: Vampiric Strikes
vampiric_strikes.description: Your attacks drain life essence from enemies, restoring 3% of damage dealt as health. Channel vital energy through your weapons to sustain yourself in prolonged combat.

fall_technique.title: Controlled Descent
fall_technique.description: Master falling techniques that reduce fall damage by 2 blocks. Roll with impacts and distribute force throughout your body to minimize harm from moderate heights.

bow_velocity.title: Powerful Draw
bow_velocity.description: Perfect your bowstring technique to increase arrow velocity by 10%. Your arrows fly faster and straighter, making them harder to dodge and extending their effective range.

crossbow_velocity.title: Optimized Crossbow
crossbow_velocity.description: Fine-tune your crossbow mechanisms to increase bolt velocity by 10%. Your projectiles travel with devastating speed, maintaining deadly accuracy over greater distances.
